ComicInfo.Summary:
The Chosen are in hot pursuit of...a giant evil walking tree? Meanwhile, Ernie and Purgatori are "guests" of the maker of "Mr. Nice Guy" happy pills, and Alice Cooper must venture into the world of nightmares, without his powers!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A/Reg | Regular Cover | Joyce Chin & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B/RI | 1:15 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Joyce Chin | 2 | C/LE | Rare "Virgin Art" Edition Cover | Joyce Chin & Ivan Nunes | 3 |
